text: Hi, I am playing with the new search engine that was just released in beta. I tried to find some documentation about this functionality without success. Can someone point me to the right direction? Does anyone knows if there are any docs for that or help me understand how to use it?

If you have any question about the search there is a slack channel <#C9LPMCT35|site-search-feedback>, here is all the documentation they have released. That I'm aware of - <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1G4Ds_fdQpHzCM2tTH6tLBQbKNs5IE95npfUy6-oNQX8/edit>
anyone know why HubSpot featured blog images sometimes return an `<http://s3.amazonaws.com|s3.amazonaws.com>` URL? Reason I ask is it's breaking the image resize functionality
Thanks <@U2H1YLSE6> I will have a look :slightly_smiling_face:
Are you using the hubl function to resize or using the query parameters in the url?
<@U6W3H6YN8> Great thanks! That did the trick.
In the new design manager, and emails, are inline_rich_text fields no longer available as SMART content?
